overview: Buddies - friends for a lifetime. In this explicit potpourri of passionate sexual escapades, ultra-stud troy recants some of the most memorable and lively, bulge-arousing moments experienced by the few of his closest and shameless pals throughout his daring lifetime. All for the sake of adventure and the lure of seductive desire where inhibitions disappear in the quest to try anything once. Troy envisions these cum-drenched, heat-filled sex plays in their most exciting and graphic detail. It will make you want to try anything once!
title: Try Anything Once
